website_summaries.verdict: A quality dog treat that is just slightly edged out by the Triumph brand for its overall value.
pros: A natural, slow-cooked jerky treat that's available in beef, chicken, or turkey
Soft and chewy with no by-products – ideal for training and treating all sizes of dogs
cons: Some testers found they cause upset stomach in some dogs, and others showed little interest in them

customer_reviews.title: Health Warning
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves the treats, but when she was given the treat she loses her appetite and gets diarrhea later. After looking at all the food ingredients on every food/snack I give her, garlic was found on this particular treat. What's the dig deal with garlic? Garlic is toxic to dog, according to the Merck Veterinary Manual along side with onion. According to the manual garlic can cause vomiting, diarrhea, or loss of appetite. I will not recommend this treat or any treats that contain garlic.
customer_reviews.author: Johny Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Dog vomit and garlic. Nuff said.
customer_reviews.text: I wish I read the dozens of reviews that said it made their dog sick. These are VERY EXPENSIVE and have GARLIC in them but are nice and tender. BUT.....my dog throws up nearly everytime I have given her one. She seems to enjoy them while consuming, but throws up shortly afterwards. It didn’t happen everytime so I wasn’t sure it was the VERY EXPENSIVE treats WITH GARLIC. But looking back it was 4 out of 5 times. So into the garbage with these VERY EXPENSIVE treats with GARLIC. I would try to return, but I’ve had them long enough to make that difficult.
customer_reviews.author: J. Garvey

customer_reviews.title: Do your dog a favor and don't buy these treats
customer_reviews.text: This product is overpriced in the first place and made my dog puke twice. My dog can eat pretty much any dog treat with these as the exception. The first time he puked I thought he was over heated but second time I knew for sure it was these dog "treats". Stay away.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Cypher

customer_reviews.title: Rocco and Roxie Jerky Sticks.
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely disappointed in my last order of this product. The strips were sorter than normal, tough and dry. I emailed the company and received no reply. Will not order again.
customer_reviews.author: BonnieBrown

customer_reviews.title: inconsistent and risky
customer_reviews.text: My dog really did like these but this is the second batch that has made her very ill. Diarrhoea all over the kitchen. I am very disappointed with this purchase. Its a real shame as the first bag was fine but the last 2 were both bad
customer_reviews.author: Serenity Warrior

customer_reviews.title: They were covered in a thick layer of mold!
customer_reviews.text: These came on the day they were supposed to be delivered. I opened them up on the day after the delivery and they are severely covered in mold. No way my dog and eat them! She’ll get sick! Waste of money! I won’t be buying again. I’m very disappointed I read the reviews and more then not they were positive. Half of the pack is covered in mold all the way up. And some are only half of the treat. Again I’m very very disappointed. Lost hard earned money on this one... also these are supposed to be good until 11/14/2019 so it’s not like I got an expired bag. Hope other persons experience is not the same.
customer_reviews.author: Chenoa

customer_reviews.title: Can't recommend, gave my dog diarrhea
customer_reviews.text: I've tried this product twice (stupid me for buying again), due to the rave reviews. Both times it gave my dog loose stools and/or diarrhea. Can't recommend. The search continues for natural doggy treats that I can safely give my dog. The mass-produced stuff is garbage in my opinion. Lately I've just been buying organic chicken breasts, cutting them into strips, and over-baking them at low temp until they're like jerky. Can't get much healthier than that.
customer_reviews.author: Jim F

customer_reviews.title: Moldy Jerky
customer_reviews.text: I pulled the tab and opened the package and all the jerky sticks were covered in mold! The package was sealed when received. Expiration says 11/7/19. For the price you pay for these, I certainly wouldn't expect this. I have bought numerous packs prior to now, but I am done after seeing this!
customer_reviews.author: CSC

customer_reviews.title: INSANE PRICE INCREASE!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: We've been buying for these years and suddenly the price jumps from $18 to $30! Are these people crazy? Time to find another brand. You know how when you were a kid and you were dying to taste those green dog biscuits? Then when you did, it was horrible and your dad made fun of you? I do. Well, these jerky treats are actually probably AWESOME enough for human consumption and no crazy colors. One bag lasts our Chihuahua 2 months and even the cat loves them. As a discerning dog mom, I feel good knowing they are also quality, healthy treat... made in the US of A!
customer_reviews.author: Tender Vigilante

customer_reviews.title: This product is a great 'treat' for dogs
customer_reviews.text: This product is a great 'treat' for dogs, but it is not what I expected. It is not like people jerky, there is really no "chew" to it - it is a really nice soft treat in 8 inch long pieces - gone in less than a minute and they are begging for more. My dogs love it! If you are looking for something your dogs will have to work at, as I am, this is not the product.
customer_reviews.author: Judy M. Graham

customer_reviews.title: Best Treat Ever!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I need a great superlative to describe these treats! I am trick training my mini schnauzer. I have tried hundreds of others treats.. Her high value treats used to be my cooked chicken. But now my secret weapon are these Jerky Sticks!! LOL! Others mentioned they are expensive.. I cut each piece into about 50 pieces. Dogs do not recognize the SIZE of the reward..small dog=tiny pieces Expensive are ones that your dog won't eat!! My dog snaps to attention and bores holes through me to learn for this reward!! Watch out you Ridiculously-Smart Border Collies, Sophie Rose is coming to class and she's training with Jerky Sticks!!!
customer_reviews.author: stressalert

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love but garlic!
customer_reviews.text: My dog goes crazy over these treats. I can train him to do anything just with these treats. By far the best. I almost want one myself! Problem is I noticed other reviews mention it and it does indeed have garlic powder which might be bad for dogs. Why would they put that in the ingredients for dog treats. Personally, I don't see any signs of him harm tbh but who knows the long term affects. I would absolutley buy again if they removed the garlic.
customer_reviews.author: Mohamed Abdin

customer_reviews.title: now we both can enjoy some jerky
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these things! She always begged when I would eat my own jerky so I wanted a similar product for my dog, now we both can enjoy some jerky! Also feel good about the ingredients in these and happy to support a small business. I have noticed no ill side effects! Great customer service too, answered my question fast and on time and if I had issues I'm sure they would have settled it promptly too. Little pricey but you do get a lot and there not everyday treats for us so its not bad. Will be buying more when we run out
customer_reviews.author: JahRebel RastafariTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy Dogs and Happy Humans
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs love these wonderful jerky stick treats! We have three dogs, one of which is a senior disabled that struggles to eat most treats as they are "too hard" for him, these jerky sticks are chewy and soft, which are absolutely perfect for him. He loves having a treat that he can actually eat and enjoy. Thank you for making our senior disabled dog feel special by getting treats he can chew and enjoy again. He is also a very picky eater and we are very happy to have found a treat that he loves the flavor of. Highly recommend and will be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: R.RossTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Quality product your dog will love!!!
customer_reviews.text: I used to give my Maltese what I thought to be a healthy treat until the company was bought out and changed the recipe. After exhaustive research I found Rocco and Roxie Supply Company's Chicken Jerky Sticks. My dog LOVES these treats!!! I was hesitant to change because he has such a sensitive stomach. No problem at all. He is quite eager and actually dances when the treats come out. By the way, just attended a family holiday with 6 dogs. They all went crazy for these treats. My family has now added this product to their dog's treat list.
customer_reviews.author: LR

customer_reviews.title: My dog loved the taste of the treats
customer_reviews.text: My dog loved the taste of the treats, but they caused him to vomit. The first couple of times that it happened I thought it is something else that's causing him to vomit because based on other reviews I had high expectations from these jerky sticks. After vomiting occurred several times we figured out that it's caused by these treats. My dog does not even have a sensitive stomach. He never had such a problem with any dog treats before, even cheaper ones.
customer_reviews.author: Fere Sabet

customer_reviews.title: The dogs seem to like it
customer_reviews.text: I don't have a dog but my neighbors do and I give the them treats. On was very picky and sometimes would just ignore the teat I gave him, I think he would eat it eventually. With these he eats them right away and seem to want more. Only suggestion I would have would to be maybe make a bigger size. With my one neighbors dog who I would say is about 60 pounds, she seemed to eat the whole thing in one gulp, did not seem to chew it or anything. Overall seems like a pretty good product, got a reasonable amount for a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Gary W. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Redesigned bag.  Poor seal results in mold.
customer_reviews.text: They have redesigned the bag for the worst. Unless the treats are kept tightly sealed they either dry out or turn moldy. Either way, an expensive product is quickly destroyed.
customer_reviews.author: Engineer

customer_reviews.title: Bad packaging Incredible dog treats
customer_reviews.text: Hey guys and gals thanks for reading my review. I love these treats by Rocco because my fur babies love these treats. I have purchased 8 bags in total from this company and mostly had good experiences. The only time I get bothered by them it is ALWAYS for the same reason. THEIR PACKAGING IS FAULTY! What I mean by that is 3 of the bags I have ordered have had issues with the ziplock portion of the container seperating from the wall of the bag. I feel that for $20+ for a bag of dog treats they can afford a more reliable medium to store their tasty doggo treats. Sorry for the rant and hope I was helpful.
customer_reviews.author: GTFIXIT4ME

customer_reviews.title: Don't recommend the new formula
customer_reviews.text: I gave the product 5 stars for the past year. My last 2 orders for some reason caused my chi to vomit every time she takes one. I thought the bag before last went bad for some reason and I opened the one I just received and same results. I'm not sure of the ingredients changed or what happened but, my wife and I noticed that the sticks look grainy and the color is pale unlike the 12-15 bags we purchased in the past from Amazon and chewy.com
customer_reviews.author: Maged

customer_reviews.title: Great Product; However Change in Packaging seems to have also impacted the quality of the sticks.
customer_reviews.text: We have been ordering these beef sticks for our dogs for over two years. They love them. It's their morning snack. Great quality! I would have given 5 stars but the latest batch came in "new packaging," but it appears they have changed the recipe for the beef sticks as well. Those in the new packages were harder and more brittle. They smelled okay, but I am a little unsure of this batch and whether they are really ok (and/or same quality). Hopefully, the seller will read this and contact me back.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Holy cow (or maybe pig) these things are WONDERFUL!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these as 'kennel treats' to encourage our dog to get into the kennel without fighting. He caught on to what was going on the first day. Now he RACES to the kennel each time we reach for the bag. These are almost too good to be true. I like that you can break them off into smaller morsels for him so we don't have to use a whole stick at once. We just use two small sections a day. This should last us months and Julius absolutely loves them. We ONLY use them for kennel treats and have another treat for training so he doesn't get confused.
customer_reviews.author: L. Shuler

customer_reviews.title: These treats are amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Our dog has never been a fan of treats, to the point that it was impossible to treat train him. I first bought these because I was looking for a healthy alternative to treats. He is also a very, very picky eater, which is quite unusual in a Lab. I gave him one of these treats and he immediately scarfed it down. He knows where we keep them and if anyone goes in that closet he is right there waiting. I can't say enough about these treats. We got through a bag a week and I am so happy we finally found something that he loves and that is good for him.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Schwoyer

customer_reviews.title: Sam stands up & gets these treats off the pantry shelf!!!
customer_reviews.text: OMG!!! My 7 month old poodle chihuahua mix puppy is soooo picky that he will actually go without eating his dog food for 2 days unless I cut up and put these Rocco & Roxie Gourmet Beef Jerky Sticks in his food bowl..He actually runs to the pantry when I open the door so he can get to the bag (on the lowest shelf & he has long legs & tiny body & head & he can stand on his hind legs for, at least, 3 minutes) and will stand up, balancing himself while reaching for these treats!!! He hardly eats anything as it is..but these treats are "the bomb" to Sam!!! Just wish they came in a larger bag!!!
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: My Dog Loves These! Tasty Rewards and a Great Help With Her Training!
customer_reviews.text: The Humane Society gave me a bag of these when I adopted my dog. I cut the sticks into small pieces and use them for training treats. She loves them, so I bought another bag here on Amazon because I can't find them at any of the pet stores here. They smell just like human jerky sticks! I like that they're made in the US by a small family-owned company. Please keep making them! She responds very well to her potty training when I use these and they're tasty rewards.
customer_reviews.author: Crafty Slacker

customer_reviews.title: My pack’s favorite by far
customer_reviews.text: I keep the pup’s snack in a large drawer in my TV room. They get this treat as the big reward of the day for them. They hear the drawer with the the Rocco & Roxie Gourmet Jerky Dog Treats open and the come running from every corner of the house and wait for me to hand them out. Tails wagging while chewing tells my they are really enjoying this snack. I wish the would lower the price as I just retired
customer_reviews.author: Tomas Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Try Them - Your Dog Will Thank You!!
customer_reviews.text: My "Morkie" (Yorkie / Maltese cross) absolutely loves these! She has 3 favorite treats I rotate giving her, but when it's time for this one she literally dances with joy! I've tried the Chicken and the Beef and now I just give her the Beef. She's so small, only 7 lbs., and can't have too much at one time, But, she would have these all day long if I let her! Try them and see what your dog thinks. Mine is super picky and she liked these after the first sniff! Also, the seller is super great and so accommodating and pleasant. You really can't lose!
customer_reviews.author: Teri

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but good, especially if your dog is sensitive
customer_reviews.text: My Akita has allergies and an autoimmune disease, so I was looking for something grain free but without potato filler as well. So these popped up. Expensive, but my boy is on a lot of meds right now and I wanted him to have a nice treat, something not made in China. I got them today and they smelled good enough to eat myself! The ingredient list is limited, and my two Akitas each gobbled up a stick. Later, my boy was checking out the Amazon box hoping for more! (Too bad, I hid them!) I can see myself buying these once every two months or so. I'll use them in toys to help them maybe last a little longer!
customer_reviews.author: S. VanhooseTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Two paws up
customer_reviews.text: My poodles love these things. They’ll be outside doing their duty and I’ll say “Who wants a cookie (aka treat)?” and they come running. One waits at the bottom of the stairs until I say it again. When inside they watch each other for any sign the other has abandoned their cookie to swoop in and steal it. My dogs’ mouths are small so these treats are soft enough for them to hold in their paws and eat themselves. Most other brands I have to cut into little pieces so the can eat them.
customer_reviews.author: llilly

customer_reviews.title: My Bella🐶 CHANGE her MIND😮!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 11months old pure Maltese puppy. I don’t know what happened🤔. I received a sample from Amazon for my Bella to try. She liked it & ate it so then I ordered the exact one. Once I start giving her little bits of pieces, she didn’t want to eat it🥺. I repeated some other times and the result was the same. She wouldn’t eat it. My Bella is the “pickiest “ puppy when it comes to food and treats! I wanted lots of 💰trying different brands. I figured she ate the jerky samples that was sent to me... but then, when I actually order one for her.... I guess she “Change her mind”🐶.
customer_reviews.author: Liza

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves these high quality treats
customer_reviews.text: Rocco and Roxie beef jerky dog treat is similar shape and consistency of a slim Jim. My dog immediately loved them. The look like human grade dog treats and are made in the USA. You could tell that the company that makes them is proud of their product and immediately asked for feedback after purchase. It is so difficult to find high quality safe dog treats and love that my dog loves these. They maybe expensive for dog treats but you get what you pay. The treats are great for all sizes of dogs because each stick can be broken into smaller pieces. They are very fresh and soft. I highly recommend this dog treat.
customer_reviews.author: John DTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: MY 3 dogs love this!
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 Japanese chins! Two will eat most any dog food but my little 12 yr old 4 lb one hardly eats. I have even cooked rib eye and fresh chicken for her she turns up her nose at most foods I bought this to at least get something healthy in her tummy. She will eat it that is a plus but thank goodness she drinks a lot of water because she eats very little. My other 2 love these chews I break them up in small pieces for my small dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Joan S

customer_reviews.title: Darla the Doodle APPROVED!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've never ordered these before...I thought they were a bit pricey but wanted to try them out. COMPLETELY worth it!!! I was surprised, there are a ton of these sticks in a package and I guess at the time I didn't realize they are also perforated - perfect for training!!! My Aussie Doodle goes crazy over them, definite repeat customer!! I also loved the personal touch of the "thank you" email I received after my purchase. If you are shopping for a high quality product, looking for a treat your pup will go crazy over and want to support an awesome small business - I strongly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Graphx Girl

customer_reviews.title: They are a wonderful family company like it says on the bag.it sa
customer_reviews.text: My Yorkie and Bichon love them. Due to their size they only get 1/2 a stick. I cut a few into 1/2 inch pieces and make them sit to get a piece. Last year I got a new bag that had mold on them, I called their office to see if they wanted the production number. They did and SINCERELY apologized and offered credit for the bag. A few days later I received a box of 3 bags/no charge. I love this company and their stain and odor remover WORKS when Mr. Yorkie dribbles a bit. Ten stars! They arrive fresh,as far as taste I haven't tried them yet.
customer_reviews.author: Elvisdog

customer_reviews.title: Elvis approved
customer_reviews.text: Our senior chihuahua loses his mind over these treats. Im not sure what it says when your dog's treats cost more than yours, but he loves them and it's all about him. We break little bits off and give them to him after he goes out and does his business, which was a huge mistake because some days he tries to convince us he has to go back out shortly after just having gone out. He has us trained very well. Oh well. We don't have them for very long... Spoil them rotten.
customer_reviews.author: Terry H

customer_reviews.title: Yummy Jerky Sticks
customer_reviews.text: They're not always in stock and assume the demand is high because of quality. These treats appear to be amazingly tender...very soft. Our 100 pound dog scarfs a stick down before you can say "Rocco & Roxie". Great packaging with quality closure. I wouldn't mention this except we have a variety of other expensive treats where the closures are poor. This means that with Rocco & Roxie treats stay fresh, where we see our other treats dry out and harden.
customer_reviews.author: Presentation Partners (Consignment)

customer_reviews.title: This product should be called "Meth Sticks"
customer_reviews.text: Just a warning to other dog owners: This product is like meth for dogs. We try to limit our dog Widgie to a 3-inch piece, once a day, but Widgie can't relax after her first taste. It is like she has ADHD all of a sudden. She is a senior dog so it is pretty amazing how worked up she gets. I'm even tempted to try a piece to see what the fuss is all about. Anyway, she loves these treats and I bet your dog will too!
customer_reviews.author: Darrell

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for training
customer_reviews.text: I bought these just based off the number of reviews posted, and my 5 month old chocolate lab absolutely loves them. Before I even opened the package, she had her head in the way, trying to get at them and totally bypassing her previous favorite-- cow's ears. They look and smell like real jerky-- so real that I am know craving jerky. :) These are so tasty to her that within the 45 minutes of opening the package—I finally got her to learn “down” and “come”. Skills we have been working on, but she hadn’t quite gotten yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This Is my dogs favorite treat. I love the fact that they are ...
customer_reviews.text: This Is my dogs favorite treat. I love the fact that they are easy to split up and I can use them in the training of my dog. and on a side note I tased it just because it smells so good and I was thinking that they really are not that bad if you wanted to give a dog treat shot. what you have all smelled how incredible the dog treats smell, you cannot tell me that you have not thought about it...Ok maybe it is just me, But my dog loves them. well worth the money to me. Psst, Do not tell the wife.
customer_reviews.author: Icnbaw

customer_reviews.title: Good tasting and excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: We have 4 rescue dogs—3 smallish Chihuahuas, and an old rat terrier. Two of them are quite old and have only a few teeth left. They like the taste, and I like that they break into smaller pieces fairly easily. They are very picky eaters, and though they don’t jump for joy when I give it to them, they do eat it—one of only 4 brands of treats they will deign to eat. The only change I’d make would be to have them a little more tender/moist/soft so my older ones didn’t try to swallow the pieces whole.
customer_reviews.author: RoseSBB

customer_reviews.title: My dog votes 4 feet up!
customer_reviews.text: I use this products as rewards for my dog's good behavior. She can hardly wait to wrap her tongue around it and always looks for more! I emailed the company regarding keeping the large bag of jerky sticks in the refrigerator to prevent mold or spoilage. I received a very prompt reply. Refrigeration is acceptable. I do keep a few bite-size pieces at room temperature to enhance the flavor. As with other edibles, read the listed ingredients on the bag. My dog thinks they are wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Marylyn G. Macy

customer_reviews.title: My Dog Loves These
customer_reviews.text: I just recently came upon these treats and am so glad! My vet told me to only give my dog treats made in the USA (he had some kidney damage from treats that I was unaware were made in China). These are fresh, smell great and obviously taste good because he begs for them. They are proudly made in the USA and the size is ample. I am going to be a customer from now on. I love feeling good about what I give my dog!
customer_reviews.author: nonstopreader

customer_reviews.title: Mixed bag
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a bag of the beef jerky stix awhile back and our pup loved them! They were soft and easily cut into an appropriate-sized training treat that our dog consistently enjoyed (and rarely refused, even when he was really keyed up and reactive). I reordered a bag recently and it arrived open. I exchanged it for a new one and the jerky stix in the new bag seem much drier and a bit crumbly. Not sure if this is typical but quality control may be an issue. Will probably try one more bag to see how it shows up but definitely not what I was anticipated this go-around.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: My Pom is allergic to the rice protein
customer_reviews.text: My Pomeranian is allergic to rice. I wish they would take the rice protein out! Why is it needed when it's supposed to be made of beef? I'll bet there's just about as much "rice protein " in these things as beef. Won't be buying it again UPDATE: The seller reached out to me and explained there's very little rice protein in the mixture. They truly care about dogs and their customers. I will confidently try some of their other products.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara H

customer_reviews.title: Our dogs LOVE these treats
customer_reviews.text: We like that these treats are made in the USA, there different flavors (chicken, turkey, beef), they stay fresh in their heavy zip close bags, and our dogs don't mind when we have to leave for awhile because that's when they each get a Rocco & Roxie Gourmet Jerky Dog Treat. Sooooo . . . . thanks for making our pups so happy.
customer_reviews.author: uffdasuzanne

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent
customer_reviews.text: My dog eats these, but I'm giving them 3 stars for inconsistency. The first bag I bought, the sticks were dry and hard as a rock, literally. They could not be broken up, and I could barely cut them into with kitchen shears. I thought that's how they were supposed to be, but the second bag is soft, somewhat greasy feeling, and I keep smelling them to be sure they're not rancid or moldy. He eats these as well. I'm confused. Are they supposed to be hard and dry or soft and greasy? On a positive note, my Shih Tzu is super finicky, and it's good to find a treat he'll eat. I'm not sure if I'll buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Packrat TendenciesTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Our dog loves these!
customer_reviews.text: Our dog probably loves these treats more than any we've ever given her. Since each treat comes in a long stick and she is a smaller dog, we can actually cut each one into a lot of small pieces. So one bag goes a really long way. We use these to reward her for top-notch behavior! She definitely knows what the bag looks like....
customer_reviews.author: J. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: my dog has been cycling through all his tricks trying to get another piece
customer_reviews.text: very good quality. it smells so good that i had to resist trying to eat it myself. the jerky is very moist and although the jerky itself is already sectioned off to break into smaller pieces, i was able to break it into even smaller pieces for training purposes. it looks like half of a large slim jim. there's also a pretty decent amount of jerky in one package. definitely got my money's worth in quality and quantity.
customer_reviews.author: nardio

customer_reviews.title: Great training treats
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves them. I used them as training treats for my hard-pulling dog. I took five jerky sticks on our walk and broke them into bites and gave them to her when she was walking nicely by my side. At one point we passed a dog across the street and my dog was starting to lunge, and react, but I offered her half a jerky stick, and she went for that instead, as the dog passed by. Nice and soft, easy to break into bites, and for dog to quickly eat.
customer_reviews.author: kkg17

customer_reviews.title: Very fresh, very tasty to the doggo!
customer_reviews.text: These treats arrived so fresh and tasty looking I almost tried one! Seriously though, fantastic product and even better customer service. After I got my order I got an email from the “Manager of Customer Happiness” just to inquire about my satisfaction with their product. I have a 72 lb German Shepherd and my dog LOVES these. They are about the size of a large Slim Jim so you may want to break them to ensure pup can handle them. You’ll be impressed with these. Strongly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: K.E.

customer_reviews.title: No expiration date on packaging.
customer_reviews.text: Product has no expiration date or date of manufacture listed on the package. You have no idea how long this product has been sitting at the amazon warehouses. So many other options out there that I don't need to take a chance on my puppies health.
customer_reviews.author: SJHTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Pleased Pooch
customer_reviews.text: My dog is one of those picky ones who refuses to eat treats outside of his home and sometimes hides his less favorite biscuits in his bed for when he feels like having a quick, and easy treat. However, he gobbles these up in an instant and when I break it in half and hold the other, he sniffs and sniffs for the other half after inhaling the first in about 0.5 seconds. I am so happy with this treat and have had zero instances of any throw-up mishaps like I've had with other reputable brands.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey

customer_reviews.title: They got moldy
customer_reviews.text: Bought these just before Christmas, went to give Bella one last night and they were covered in what looked like green mold, threw them away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My Beagle Likes These
customer_reviews.text: I would have given 5 stars but I thought "jerky" was like a hard chew? More of a pig ear or rawhide? These are soft and moist like a Slim Jim. I was hoping for something my dog could chew on awhile that would occupy his time a little. He loves these but he has them eaten up in a few seconds like a soft treat.
customer_reviews.author: Antlisa

customer_reviews.title: My Pups love these treats
customer_reviews.text: My pup loves these treats and I am a frequent dog sitter for relatives and their other pups that also love these too. Sometimes wonder if the reason the visiting pups love to come to my house is for these treats!! Happy that I can get these on "subscribe and save" as they are a real favorite.
customer_reviews.author: dc shopper

customer_reviews.title: These are a hit with my girl!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to let you know that these jerky dog treats were definitely a hit with my girl, Penny. She is a golden retriever and has a sensitive GI tract. I started out giving her 1/2 stick and she is doing just great with them. She really loves her new Rocco & Roxie Jerky Dog Treats! Thank you for making a great quality treat that has caused no GI problems!
customer_reviews.author: Online shopper

customer_reviews.title: My Yorkie Mix LOVES these treats....
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these treats, so I have ordered this item a few times. I have a Yorkie mix who is particularly picky when it comes to treats, and this is her go-to. I would like to remind folks to check expiration dates; I received some product that was already expired. However, this is a solid company and they listened/responded to this customer's complaint. I'll purchase again in the future -- and check the expiration date. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Tippecanoe

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love these
customer_reviews.text: I cut each stick into about 12-14 pieces and use them for training my mid-large sized dogs. Even cut up, the pieces are substantial enough that the dogs are willing to respond to commands in order to get these treats. We're on our 4th pack and very happy with them - I think the dogs are too.
customer_reviews.author: Calico8

customer_reviews.title: Dog really enjoys and they are great for breaking apart
customer_reviews.text: The dog enjoys these as rewards during training and walking. Very easy to break apart (pre indented) and soft which is great to make the bag last longer. Smells good and comes in a resealable bag. Does not appear to leave a smell anywhere and they are not big enough to leave staining.
customer_reviews.author: CharlesH

customer_reviews.title: Loved by a picky eater
customer_reviews.text: Our rescue dog is an extremely picky eater and likes very few treats that are on the market. He loves the beef flavor of these. I like that the sticks are scored and easy to break apart. We have some Nina Otteson puzzles and the sections of the sticks work perfectly in those.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves
customer_reviews.text: I came upon these as I was doing a search of dog treats and this came up and was an amazon's choice. I'll be honest, these are expensive for dog treats but she really loves them. I had tried Rachel Ray's and she likes them but once again she Loves these. I have a catahoula/shepard and she knows when treats are coming. They smell delicious and I break pieces off as I use them for training. As I stated before these are expensive but I have already reordered more.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Sabbs-Hall

customer_reviews.title: My fur baby loves them!
customer_reviews.text: My fur baby loves them. I cut them in little pieces & hide them more or less in plain sight (one of his favorite pastimes) or toss the pieces & let him chase them. The ONLY bad thing is they are too expensive to give them as often as he & I would like. Why is the chicken more expensive?
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: The BEST treats we have found.
customer_reviews.text: I have an extremely picky eater. Vet had to give him an appetite stimulant to get him to gain a little weight. We received a sample of the beef, and much to our surprise, he was begging for these treats! He loves them. We only allow him to have treats made in the US and that we feel are healthy and these fit those requirements.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: My Puppers FAVORITE treat!
customer_reviews.text: We found this wonderful treat because we randomly received a sample from Amazon. We have a cupboard full of a wide variety of treats to choose from when it’s time for a treat- these are his favorite! He loved them so much that we ordered some right away. It’s the one treat that he’ll actually BEG for lol! We will definitely continue to order! Order them! Your Puppers will love them!
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Vollmer

customer_reviews.title: Shelti-Poodle Mix Loves These Beef Jerky Treats!
customer_reviews.text: Update September 15, 2017: I purchased another bag of these treats and my sheltie-poodle mix just loves them. They are tender and moist and apparantly quite tasty. My seven year old sheltie-poodle mix loves these Beef Jerky treats. I do not buy them frequently as they are fairly pricey, however they are made using quality ingredients and she has never had any health or digestive related issues resultant from eating them. I like the fact they are segmented which permits me to easily break of pieces and extend the "life" of a bag. I also like the quality packaging which ensures the treats stay fresh for a long time. Frequently the resealable top will separate on lower-priced treats.
customer_reviews.author: Movie Fan

customer_reviews.title: A treat even the most refined palates will love.
customer_reviews.text: My dog is very picky, I always joke and say he has a "refined" palate. But he's really just a treat snob! I usually buy treats and have to give them to my sister for her labs because my dog will not eat them. But he loved these! Incredible! I am very happy I found a treat that he likes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made in America dog treats that dogs love!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these treats! And we love they are made in America as well. I have heard so many bad things regarding dog treats and how they are hurting and even killing animals, but with these, there are no bad reviews or recalls for them. My dogs just love them so much, we can get them to do tricks and learn new things because of these treats. They do come in sticks though, so if you want to use them as training treats, you will need to cut them up(we use scissors to cut them up as it is easiest for us that way). I highly recommend these to anyone looking for safe treats to give your animals!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Our Dogs Love Rocco and Roxie Sticks!
customer_reviews.text: We have four dogs ages 7 months to 10 years and ranging in weight from 15 - 80 lbs. All four dogs love these tasty treats. They are soft chews and come in long segmented sticks easy for breaking apart for appropriate portion sizes for each dog. The ingredients are natural and wholesome.
customer_reviews.author: K. Patch

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY FOR DOGS HAS GARLIC POWDER!
customer_reviews.text: My husband purchased these treats for our 2 year old pup. Curious about the ingredients I checked the label and noticed GARLIC POWDER! Garlic is a known Toxin for dogs! We are returning these immediately. If this company cares about it's clients it should remove that ingredient immediately. DO NOT BUY FOR YOUR DOG!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Morales

customer_reviews.title: Great dog treat
customer_reviews.text: On Sat, Jul 16, 2016 at 5:52 PM, Michael - Amazon Marketplace <[e-mail address removed]> wrote: The dogs love the treats! Thank you for your quality products! Michael Stephanos For Your Information: To help arbitrate disputes and preserve trust and safety, we retain all messages buyers and sellers send through Amazon.com for two years. This includes your response to the message above. Amazon.com uses filtering technology to protect buyers and sellers from possible fraud. Messages that fail this filtering will not be transmitted. We want you to buy with confidence anytime you purchase products on Amazon.com. Learn more about Safe Online Shopping ( and our safe buying guarantee (
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great dog treats, especially inside KONG Wobbler
customer_reviews.text: Dog loves them. Soft and easy to break into smaller treats and place inside of toys. Smell excellent and dog doesn't have any issues with the stool after consuming them. We personally love throwing them in the. Dog finds it challenging to get it out.
customer_reviews.author: Adam P.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Our hounds go crazy over these treats!!!
customer_reviews.text: We have 2 dogs we rescued from the shelter my wife volunteers. Wanted to give the dogs a REAL treat and these did the trick. Even when I just open the bag when they are sleeping they mysteriously wake up to attention as they know a tasty treat is ready to be feasted upon. Also easy to divide one treat into smaller portions as they are scored . Highly recommend and will be buying more once devoured....which won't be long!
customer_reviews.author: Virginia-Jim

customer_reviews.title: Quality product at a reasonable price my dogs love
customer_reviews.text: I initially received a sample of this product through Amazon. I am very particular about what I feed my dogs. This product is all natural, made in small batches, so it has high quality control. My dogs absolutely loved them and even the dog with a finicky stomach had no issues digesting either the chicken or beef (only flavors we tried). We used to get a different brand that had similar quality, but was much higher priced and had too much excess packaging. I love that Rocco and Roxie really cares about their product and their customer. I was super impressed that the manager took the time to send a special note thanking me for purchasing their product.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Stratton

customer_reviews.title: Tasty options for the pups
customer_reviews.text: I used to buy something similar from a small company on Instagram. But the shipping for them was horrible. These, thank God are on amazon and I got them within a week! The pups love them just the same!. I love that I have the option to cut them up for training, or jut give them a stick as a bonus snack. Definitely will buy again! Handy snacks to keep in the car for trips. Great to keep them cut up in ziplock bags for training opportunities
customer_reviews.author: A Furmom

customer_reviews.title: Healthy Dog Treats - Made in USA Only
customer_reviews.text: Paul, (Co-Founder Rocco & Roxie Supply Co.) My dog CeCe loves your treats. I will be buying more when these are gone. Thanks for making healthy treats for my little poodle dog. Johnny the HappyHomesteader... Update:Paul, My dog CeCe is a small female 12 pound poodle mix and she really loves your jerky treats! When she hears me opening the package, she is right there 'front and center', no matter what she was doing at the time. This is the second bag we have ordered... I am really pleased with your product! Thank you, Johnny
customer_reviews.author: HappyHomesteader

customer_reviews.title: Moist and Handy
customer_reviews.text: Best treats ever! Our dog loves them and all the dogs we watch. Our dog is very picky and won’t eat most treats. They are notched sticks. So you can break them into bite size pieces. They are nice and moist and come in a pouch that zips back up for freshness.
customer_reviews.author: LinMonte

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy. Toxic to dogs.
customer_reviews.text: This has been said by others, but for the sake of dogs everywhere, I hope this message is seen. Humans like salt and sugar. Dogs do not need this. Humans also like garlic powder. This is toxic to dogs. Please stop supporting this company.
customer_reviews.author: DNghiem

customer_reviews.title: Only the best
customer_reviews.text: My son has been ordering them for a while now. Last week he fell 14 thought his ceiling and had major surgery at Thomas Jefferson and is now in Magee. So I am actually ordering the product for my sons dog. (OUR grand dog Capone) And he loves your treats!!! Yes we receive a 5 star experience!!! We were so happy to find out about your products, it gives us comfort we can trust Rocco & Roxie!!!
customer_reviews.author: George Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Great treat!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great treat for both your dog, and yourself. I have a dog who is very strong willed. He becomes an absolute angel in order to receive this product. I have shared it with others and they are equally happy with it. This is my dogs favorite treat.
customer_reviews.author: powderpuff

customer_reviews.title: The dogs (and the cat) love them.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs, and the cat, love them. Kinda like Slim Jims for your pets, but not greasy or full of chemicals! I think they like them because they're chewy and have a nice smoky aroma. I like how they have indentations along each length so it's easier to break or cut them apart. I use kitchen scissors to cut off small pieces for my cat, Pepper. Well, then I have to put those little pieces up on his cat tree so the puppy can't snatch them!
customer_reviews.author: GeezerWench - MizzRickTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love them.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the packaging. Neat, clean, easy to get into, and keeps the jerky fresh. We have two 90 lb. labradoodles that I believe would walk on their lips for a piece of jerky. I think there pretty good too.
customer_reviews.author: kydave

customer_reviews.title: Boots Always Wants More
customer_reviews.text: My small dog puppy loves these so much that she will dance around on her hind legs while I tease her by holding the skinny treat so high she has to dance for my entertainment. I've been buying them for quite a while, and Boots tells me that they are delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Huck Feen

customer_reviews.title: This is my 5th or 6th time ordering these and my dogs love them but they did not enjoy as much because ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a couple of days ago and received product which was stale and not their usual soft and chewy texture. I complained to Amazon and by the end of the day, I received (2) VERY fresh packages (chicken and beef 16 oz) pack for free and I was refunded for the stale package. My dogs are very happy and so am I. Thank you Rocco & Roxie!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Simms

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this is you care about your dog(s)
customer_reviews.text: Made my dog and my daughter's dogs sick! All three dogs had the runs bad after eating these treats. Three different breeds of dogs, all three were sick. We tried a second time and had the same results on all three. Poor fur babies. Don't waste your money and your dog's stomachs!
customer_reviews.author: b.m.

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves these treats
customer_reviews.text: It used to be a hassle when I needed to put my dog in the car. She would run around the car for fun (or to torture me) and the process was never smooth. Now I use these treats as "car treats" and she knows when she gets in the car, these treats will be waiting for her. She runs to the car door and waits eagerly to get right into the car. Now we are both happy.
customer_reviews.author: Sue the Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Happy Tummies
customer_reviews.text: My dogs LOVE these! The smell like wonderful people food, and the ingredient list is simple; with only things I can pronounce like American raised beef, and smoke flavoring. They are tender enough to break into bites for training. The dogs are absolutely crzy over them, and my GSD Gus, who has a bit of a delicate digestion, has no tummy upset fro them at all. I'm going to order the other flavors soon.
customer_reviews.author: Pennymac02

customer_reviews.title: My dogs say these are the best!
customer_reviews.text: I have an older Boston Terrier with a chicken allergy, and a little rescue dog with missing teeth. It’s really hard to find treats they love/can eat/won’t cause gastric distress. These are so delicious I have to ration them; they insist that they should eat the whole bag the day it arrives.
customer_reviews.author: CAM

customer_reviews.title: My dogs beg for them!
customer_reviews.text: My small Yorkie and Briewer love them. I normally cut them into 2-4 pieces, which is easy to do since they are soft rods. My oldest enjoys them ... and she only has one tooth left! They never have caused a digestive problem. My male Yorkie loved them too, and he had allergies and a sensitive digestive system.
customer_reviews.author: S.Dahlgren

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for doggy that had dental work!  Super soft&yummy, but careful opening bag!!!  Warned you!
customer_reviews.text: Product prefect for one of our dogs for 12 teeth pulled!!!! Was sad to watch however once his mouth healed this was the first soft treat he got! Loved it. My jne complaint is the packaging, not even the packaging but how to open the package!? Weve ordered 3 pacakges first one went fine next two really bad! Tore whole top off cause tried to pull tab from the front. Need better bag. Just a plain zioloc would do.
customer_reviews.author: bnakano

customer_reviews.title: Great product, highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: My beagle loves these. It’s easy to break them off and serve as little treats. And as advertised, they don’t have a bad smell at all (I’m a vegetarian and don’t like the smell of meat). I use these treats as positive reinforcement to leash train my girl and also stop her from barking and it worked like a charm! She’s more attentive when I hold these in my hand.
customer_reviews.author: Shraddha Sainath

customer_reviews.title: My dog LOVES these
customer_reviews.text: My dog knows what he likes and doesn't like and can be a bit picky when it comes to treats, he is spoiled I know, but he loves Rocco & Roxie (the beef flavor is his favorite). I love that they always look fresh when I open a new bag and that it looks and smells like high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Daniela

customer_reviews.title: Made in the USA for Tiko and Suzy
customer_reviews.text: Dear Paul, You wrote to us once before and sadly I had to reply that our sweet boy had gone to sleep on October 27. We kept the rest of the bag because we were too sentimental to give it up and at the same time optimistic that we would adopt another dog one day when we felt better. We interviewed a beautiful little girl Shiba Inu two weeks ago and she is coming to live with us next weekend. While she was here I gave her one of your chicken sticks and she loved it. So I bought another bag just for her. Thanks for helping us to impress her with our good taste! Our best to you.
customer_reviews.author: cafe114

customer_reviews.title: dogs love these
customer_reviews.text: Definitely more expensive than the treats from Trader Joe's and Costco, but the quality and taste of these make me spend the extra money. My only problem with all smoked dog treats is the higher sodium content. It would be nice to have the sodium content printed in labels just like the ones required on human foods.
customer_reviews.author: VA Peach

customer_reviews.title: Product quality
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed, bought this item twice hoping previous order was old but quality was same. Too hard and some white residue on sticks. My yorkie had a hard time chewing it and I had to cut off pieces with a knife. She loved these but I am not buying them again.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied customer

customer_reviews.title: Rocco and Roxie treats
customer_reviews.text: This company really knows what dogs love. Out of any treat iv givin my two dogs these guys go absolutely nuts for these ones. Don't know what it is but my one dog Jax, the one in picture literally jumps and doesn't stop twirling until I give him one lol.
customer_reviews.author: Derek S.

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves these!
customer_reviews.text: I use these as a reward when my dog gets her nails cut. She's fearful of getting them cut due to someone cutting the quik in the past which was painful for her. These jerky treats are a real hit, she loves them! We were sent a sample in the mail and so glad!
customer_reviews.author: Beachbound

customer_reviews.title: smell so good, I'm tempted to eat them myself
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the best dog treat I've found after 20+ years of owning dogs (other than actual pieces of steak, liver, etc).. Dogs love them, and they are exceptionally good for use in training. Each stick easily breaks into smaller pieces. They smell great and seem fresh when you open the bag.
customer_reviews.author: smallwaters

customer_reviews.title: PERRY'S  CHOICE
customer_reviews.text: I've had these treats for Perry for over a year, and theres been other treats I've tried as well, but I'll tell you... When I pick up THIS bag of treats, my Perry gets SO excited because these, over all others, is HIS choice of treat. Pricey, yes. But they are safe and are made right here in the USA, so you never have to worry about if they are a healthy choice. Best tasting and a healthy choice! Only wish they lasted a little longer. Perry devours them! Try taking it away from him! He will run all over the house with this stick in his mouth, saying "NO WAY! This is MY treat!" So funny 😂!
customer_reviews.author: Christy Continued

customer_reviews.title: It's probably a great product for some dogs but my dog has a ...
customer_reviews.text: It's probably a great product for some dogs but my dog has a sensitive stomach and he threw it up.
customer_reviews.author: Toye

customer_reviews.title: Best dog treats ever, well worth the price for the quality
customer_reviews.text: We have two very stubborn Shiba Inu pups. Our girl has severe epilepsy to the point where her seizures can become life threatening. It is exceedingly important that she take her medication every 12 hours but, being a stubborn Shiba, some days are easier than others. Thanks to your high quality jerky treats, she eats her pill more frequently and gives us peace of mind. Thank you for all you do for some very important members of our family!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

product_meta.title: Rocco & Roxie Gourmet Jerky Dog Treats Made in USA - Slow Roasted, Delicious, Tender and Healthy 6" Jerky Sticks Treat - Choose Beef, Chicken or Turkey - 16 oz. Bag
feature_bullets: HEALTHY & NATURAL - You want only the best for your best friend. So the premium treats we make at Rocco & Roxie are never enhanced with artificial flavoring or fillers like corn, soy and gluten. They are naturally irresistible. Like dogs.

SECRET FAMILY RECIPE DOGS LOVE - What’s the secret to these tasty treats? We start with all-American beef of the highest quality. The second ingredient is time. It takes a full 10 hours of smoking to develop that soft chewy texture dogs love.

100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEED - We have been told that even the most finicky dogs love our Jerky Sticks. But don’t take our word for it. Break off a piece, see if that tail wags. Tails are such a give-away.
PERFECT TRAINING TREAT - Your dog accomplishes a task; he gets a treat. He gets a treat he really really loves and that makes him want to learn more. Our treats are super motivating!
NO-STINK HANDS - Unlike artificially enhanced dog treats that leave a greasy, smelly residue on your hands, these feel and smell just like a delicious piece of beef jerky.
